actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to permit schools offering degrees in social work to obtain grants for training projects in geriatrics, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to add social work schools to the list of schools eligible for grants and contracts for training physicians and dentists who plan to teach geriatric medicine or geriatric dentistry.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to permit schools offering degrees in social work to obtain grants for training projects in geriatrics, and for other purposes.
